testcase.name: User is able to load and navigate to estimation page
testcase.system-out: Given user is opening the browser...........................................passed When user enter's the correct URL'..........................................passed Then user is able to navigate to expected page..............................passed

testcase.name: User is able to view the borrowing capacity by entering by filling the form and able to clear it.
testcase.system-out: Given user is in calculator page............................................passed When a person is single.....................................................passed When person has 0 dependants,...............................................passed When person is buying a home to live in,....................................passed When person with income of $80,000,.........................................passed When person has other income $10,000,.......................................passed When person's living expenses $500,.........................................passed When person's current home loan repayments $0,..............................passed When person's other loan repayments $100,...................................passed When person's other commitments $0..........................................passed When person's total credit card limits $10,000..............................passed Then person's borrowing capacity would be $479,000..........................passed Given start over button is visible and active...............................passed When user clicks start over button..........................................passed Then form fields values get cleared.........................................passed

testcase.name: Application displays the expected warning message when user fails to enter the expected details.
testcase.system-out: Given user is in borrow calculator page.....................................passed When user enter's '$1' in the living expense field..........................passed When user leves other field value as zero...................................passed When user click's Work out how much I could borrow button...................passed Then user is able to view the expected message in application...............passed
